thread.title: Going for the food? New travel guides aim to please and feed
thread.title_full: Going for the food? New travel guides aim to please and feed

author: J.M. HIRSCH The Associated Press
title: Going for the food? New travel guides aim to please and feed
text:
The Associated Press Going for the food? New travel guides aim to please and feed 
This image provided by HarperCollins Publishers shows the cover of the book "Rice, Noodle, Fish: Deep Travels Through Japan's Food Culture," by Anthony Bourdain. The book includes interviews and news-to-use tidbits. (HarperCollins Publishers via AP) The Associated Press Going for the food? New travel guides aim to please and feed 
This image provided by Lonely Planet shows the cover for the book "Italy: From the Source." It is part of a new line of cookbooks that offer takes on the cuisine of a particular country. (Lonely Planet via AP) The Associated Press Going for the food? New travel guides aim to please and feed 
This image provided by Lonely Planet shows the cover for the book "Thailand: From the Source." It is part of a new line of cookbooks that offer takes on the cuisine of a particular country. (Lonely Planet via AP) ADVERTISEMENT
